comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
here's a patch.

soon we need to refactor these collation tests (unicode collation changed a lot in this version).

I think they should just generate a bunch of strings, collate them in a List or something,
and compare that to the index sort instead.

comments.author: Steve Rowe

description: version 4.6 supports unicode 6, new collators (search collators) etc.
